Testes da App¶

Unit tests for the Agrigest backend application.

This module contains tests for: - ConfigManager singleton behavior - WeatherServiceFacade data retrieval - Login API endpoint

Uses pytest and Flask’s test client.

backend.tests.test_app.client()¶

Provides a Flask test client for API endpoint testing.

This fixture configures the Flask app for testing and yields a test client that can be used to simulate HTTP requests to the application.

Returns:

The test client for the Flask app.

Return type:

FlaskClient

This function sets the Flask app to testing mode and yields a test client instance, allowing tests to interact with the API endpoints as if they were real HTTP clients.

backend.tests.test_app.test_config_manager_singleton()¶

Ensures ConfigManager implements the singleton pattern.

This test creates two instances of ConfigManager and asserts that both references point to the same object, confirming the singleton behavior.

Returns:

None

The function checks that multiple instantiations of ConfigManager return the same object, ensuring the singleton design pattern is correctly implemented.

backend.tests.test_app.test_login_success(client)¶

Checks that a successful login returns a token in the response.

This test sends a POST request to the login endpoint with valid credentials and asserts that the response contains a token and has HTTP 200 status.

Parameters:

client (FlaskClient) – Flask test client used to send HTTP requests.

Returns:

None

The function verifies that a valid login attempt returns a response with status code 200 and includes a token in the JSON payload.

backend.tests.test_app.test_weather_facade(client, mocker)¶

Verifies WeatherServiceFacade returns correct weather data using a mocked API call.

This test mocks the weather API call to return predefined data and checks that the WeatherServiceFacade returns the expected result.

Parameters:

  • client (FlaskClient) – Flask test client (unused in this test).

  • mocker (pytest_mock.MockerFixture) – Pytest-mock fixture for mocking functions.

Returns:

None

The function patches the weather API call to return mock data, then checks that the WeatherServiceFacade returns the same data, ensuring correct integration with the mocked API.
